actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 1659) entitled "A bill for the relief of Herbert T. Matsuo, Patrick Wayne Matsuo, Susan Villarta, and the estate of Arline L. Matsuo," to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 1659 to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 1659) entitled "A bill for the relief of Herbert T. Matsuo, Patrick Wayne Matsuo, Susan Villarta, and the estate of Arline L. Matsuo," to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
